p: This study was approved by the Eswatini National Health Research Review Board, the University Research Co., LLC’s Institutional Review Board (IRB) (USA), the IRB for Human Subject Research at Baylor College of Medicine and Affiliated Hospitals (USA), the IRB for Baylor College of Medicine Children’s Foundation-Eswatini (Eswatini), and Dartmouth College’s Committee for the Protection of Human Subjects (USA). Verbal consent was obtained from participants.
